citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
A current Program of Veterinary care was not available for review. The facility has a new Attending Veterinarian, however
the Program of Veterinary care had not been updated. All documentation must contain current information and be
available for review during APHIS inspections. The facility must correct this issue.
*********Correct by August 7, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n
